column4: wow. only 1580 ppl online.. that new floodbot sure gets rid of the riff-raff.
what do you mean?.. it just monitors flooding, etc..
I got this what is 2+4 thing and it would not let me in until I answered it or registered my nick
yeah...?.. thast what its supposed to do... register your nick, and you'll never haev to do it again
